name: Quiz Express
summary: English grammar is the way in which meanings are encoded into wordings in the English language. This includes the structure of words, phrases, clauses, and sentences, right up to the structure of whole texts. It is important to speak and write grammatically correct English that is universally understood. The motivation behind this quiz app is for you to practice your English grammar regularly while on the go. We believe you can learn better by practicing rather than just studying grammar rules. The quiz is designed such that each session takes no more than a minute to complete thus you can easily find time to play it even while commuting.
